Package jsx.motion

Provides clear-in-mind practicable methodologies for definition and utilization to step-motion models that are useful in designing animation, visual effects and vector graphics.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Fourier Defines motions by approximating sample data with a Fourier interpolation.
Interpolator An abstract base class to define motions by approximating sample data with various interpolation methodologies.
Linear Defines motions by approximating sample data with the simplest linear interpolation.
Motion An abstract base class for motion definitions.
Regular Defines motions with various regular mathematical functions.
Speed Defines motions with the specified speed motion.
Spline Defines motions by approximating sample data with a cubic spline interpolation.
 

Package jsx.motion Description

Provides clear-in-mind practicable methodologies for definition and utilization to step-motion models that are useful in designing animation, visual effects and vector graphics.
